div.div: Projected wetland response to climate change for a) Deschutes National Forest, OR, b) Willamette National Forest, OR, and c) Trinity Alps Wilderness, CA.
div.p: Blue solid lines are wetland hydrographs for years 2003–2004 and red dashed lines show wetland hydrographs of years 2003–2004 with climate change perturbation for the 2080s.
